CCDD

Class CcddSchedulerEditorHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • CCDD.CcddSchedulerEditorHandler

  • public class CcddSchedulerEditorHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    CFS Command and Data Dictionary scheduler editor handler class

    • Constructor Detail

      • CcddSchedulerEditorHandler

        CcddSchedulerEditorHandler(CcddMain ccddMain,
                           CcddSchedulerHandler schedulerHndlr,
                           int totalMessages,
                           int totalBytes,
                           int msgsPerSecond)
        Scheduler editor handler class constructor
        Parameters:
        ccddMain - main class reference
        schedulerHndlr - reference to the scheduler dialog that created this class
        totalMessages - total number of parent messages
        totalBytes - total number of bytes per a second
        msgsPerSecond - total messages per second

      • updateRemainingBytesColumn

        protected void updateRemainingBytesColumn()
        Set the bytes column for all messages in the scheduler table

      • updateRemainingBytesColumn

        private void updateRemainingBytesColumn(int msgIndex)
        Set the bytes column for the specified message in the scheduler table. If the remaining bytes is less than zero the text is displayed in red
        Parameters:
        msgIndex - index of the message to update, which is the same as the row in the scheduler table

        Returns:

        Get the total amount of unused bytes
        Returns:
        Total amount of bytes remaining

      • getMaxNumberOfSubMessages

        private int getMaxNumberOfSubMessages()
        Get the maximum number of sub-messages from the messages
        Returns:
        Maximum number of sub-messages; 0 if only the message(s) only contains a default sub-message

      • initializeSchedulerTable

        private void initializeSchedulerTable()
        Initialize the scheduler table. Add values to the current data which is used when creating the table. The message list is also initialized

      • updateSchedulerTable

        protected void updateSchedulerTable(boolean isLoadData)
        Update the scheduler table based on the current messages
        Parameters:
        isLoadData - true to load the scheduler table with the data; false to only update the scheduler table data array

      • calculateTotalBytesRemaining

        protected void calculateTotalBytesRemaining()
        Calculate the number of unused bytes for all messages and sub-messages, accounting for bit-packed variables

      • copyMessages

        private void copyMessages(java.util.List<CcddClassesDataTable.Message> messageList,
                          java.util.List<CcddClassesDataTable.Message> copyList,
                          CcddClassesDataTable.Message parentMessage)
        Copy the specified (sub-)messages to the specified copy location
        Parameters:
        messageList - list of (sub-)messages to copy
        copyList - reference to the list to which to copy the (sub-)messages
        parentMessage - parent of the sub-message; null if this is not a sub-message

      • addVariableToMessage

        protected void addVariableToMessage(CcddClassesDataTable.Variable variable,
                                    int messageIndex,
                                    int subMsgIndex)
        Add a variable to the specified (sub-)message. Update the message and table with the new values
        Parameters:
        variable - variable that will be added
        messageIndex - message index if the variable is not assigned to a sub-message; sub-message index if the message is assigned to a sub-message
        subMsgIndex - message index if the variable is assigned to a sub-message, -1 if not

        protected void setSelectedRow(int row)
        Select the message name column in the specified row of the scheduler table
        Parameters:
        row - row to select, model coordinates

      • removeSelectedVariable

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.String> removeSelectedVariable()
        Remove the selected variable(s). This will remove it from any other messages the variable is in. If the variable is a member of a link it removes all the other link member variables as well
        Returns:
        List of variable names removed

      • removeVariablesFromMessages

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String> removeVariablesFromMessages(java.util.List<CcddClassesDataTable.Variable> variables,
                                                                     int row)
        Remove the specified variable(s) from all messages it is contained in
        Parameters:
        variables - list of variables to remove
        row - message row index
        Returns:
        List of the variable names removed

      • getMessageAvailability

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.String> getMessageAvailability(float rate)
        Find all the combinations of messages into which a a rate fits
        Parameters:
        rate - rate, in hertz, of the selected variable
        Returns:
        List of the combinations

      • getOptions

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String> getOptions(int rate)
        Get a list of the options for non-sub-hertz rates in the format [MessageName1][, MessageName2],...]]
        Parameters:
        rate - rate filter, in hertz
        Returns:
        List of all the combinations

      • getSubOptions

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSubOptions(float rate)
        Find all the options for sub-hertz
        Parameters:
        rate - hertz of the selected variable
        Returns:
        List of all the combinations

      • setMessageAvailability

        protected void setMessageAvailability(int messageIndex,
                                      int size)
        Set the message name to green if the message has room for the size; if not set the name to red. Also set the table model to display the number of bytes after the variable is added
        Parameters:
        messageIndex - row number for which to set the values
        size - size that needs to fit in the message

      • resetMessageAvailability

        protected void resetMessageAvailability()
        Reset the message name to its normal state

      • getMessageSize

        protected int getMessageSize(int index)
        Get the message size for the specified message index
        Parameters:
        index - message index
        Returns:
        Message size

      • getMessage

        protected CcddClassesDataTable.Message getMessage(int messageIndex,
                                                  int parentIndex)
        Get the message at the specified indices
        Parameters:
        messageIndex - message index if this is a parent message; sub-message index if this is a sub-message
        parentIndex - parent message index if this is a sub-message; -1 if not a sub-message
        Returns:
        Message object at the given indices

      • getSelectedMessage

        private CcddClassesDataTable.Message getSelectedMessage()
        Get the (sub-)message currently selected in the scheduler table
        Returns:
        The currently selected (sub-)message; null if none is selected

      • clearVariablesFromMessages

        protected void clearVariablesFromMessages(java.lang.String rateFilter)
        Remove the variables (applications) assigned to the messages (time slots)
        Parameters:
        rateFilter - rate of the variables to removed from the telemetry messages; null to remove all variables. Not used for the application scheduler

      • addSubMessage

        protected void addSubMessage()
        Add a sub-message to the message currently selected in the scheduler table

      • deleteSubMessage

        protected void deleteSubMessage()
        Delete the sub-message associated with the currently selected assignment tab

      • deAllocateSubVariables

        private boolean deAllocateSubVariables(CcddClassesDataTable.Message message)
        Deallocate any sub-message variables if the number of sub-messages is changed
        Parameters:
        message - message for which the variables are deallocated from each sub-message
        Returns:
        true if the variable is deallocated or there are no variables to deallocate; false if there are variable to deallocate but the user cancels the operation

      • getCurrentMessages

        protected java.util.List<CcddClassesDataTable.Message> getCurrentMessages()
        Get the list of current messages
        Returns:
        List of current messages

      • isMessagesChanged

        protected boolean isMessagesChanged()
        Compare the current messages to the committed messages to detect any changes
        Returns:
        true if a message's content changed; false if no change exists

      • isMessageChanged

        private boolean isMessageChanged(CcddClassesDataTable.Message currMsg,
                                 CcddClassesDataTable.Message commMsg)
        Compare the current (sub-)message to the committed (sub-)message to detect any changes
        Parameters:
        currMsg - reference to the message's current values
        commMsg - reference to the message's original values
        Returns:
        true if the (sub-)message's content changed; false if no change exists
